column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#id=1
#text=After a long workout at the gym , I got home and immediately wanted to take a bath .
#id=2
#text=First , I turned the water in my tub on as hot as it could go so the water could warm up .
#id=3
#text=Then , after the water warmed up , I placed two fingers in the stream of water to see how hot it was .
#id=4
#text=After that , I adjusted the water to a temperature I could enjoy during my bath .
#id=5
#text=Now that the water was at the correct temperature , I put the stop drain in place .
#id=6
#text=This allows the water to stay in the tub .
#id=7
#text=After the stop drain was in place , I put soap in the water .
#id=8
#text=Now it was time to let the water fill the tub .
#id=9
#text=When the tub was full of water , it was time for me to get in .
#text=I laid in the water and got a wash cloth to wipe and rinse myself off .
#text=Then I let the water drain and got a towel to dry myself off .
